Detailed Description

The TriX user documentation.

All functions in this documentation can be accessed in TriX scripts.
It's recommended using only these functions although many TriX internal functions can be accessed by just putting a double underscore __ in front of it.

Function Documentation

int NokiaCreateFunc (  object *  obj,
int  offset
) 
 

Creates one or more functions in the MCU. Segments with the same name (e.g. .text and .text) are NOT supported!

Parameters:
obj an object, with one or more functions. Could also include relocatable data. See object for an example.
offset address where the function(s) should be created. Could be MEM_AUTO. Use !SYM_EXP if you want to export more than one Symbol.
Returns:
E_FAIL or number of modified bytes

void SetDebugLevel (  int  debuglevel  ) 
 

Sets debug level output

Parameters:
debuglevel Or'ed values of these: DEBUG_FMT, DEBUG_SEER, DEBUG_ARM, DEBUG_NOKIA, DEBUG_LIST or DEBUG_UNKNOWN

int SymbolAdd (  const char *  name,
const int  type,
const char *  data
) 
 

Adds a symbol to the pool

Parameters:
name name of symbol, in most cases fucntion name
type type of the symbol, in most cases SYM_PTR
data string with dezimal or hexadecimal number ... or something else

int SymbolGetInt (  const char *  name  ) 
 

Get int of a symbol

Parameters:
name symbol name
Returns:
int or E_FAIL
